title: Unlogical source code
body:
by **BerengarLehr**: 
IMHO the crypto/cipher pkg has a kind-of-typo:

L60 cbc.go:
NewCBCDecrypter should NOT return *cbcDecrypter BUT BlockMode. (cbcDecrypter should be a
private type of the crypto/cipher pkg.

Probably consistent with this, the documentation about NewCBCDecrypter should be placed
below "type Blockmode" along with NewCBCEncrypter.
